text: John Campbell McTiernan Jr. (born January 8, 1951) is an American movie director, producer and screenwriter. He is best known for his action movies, especially Predator (1987), Die Hard (1988), and The Hunt for Red October (1990). ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Movie producers from New York (state) Category:Screenwriters from New York (state) Category:People from Albany, New York
title: John McTiernan
